author: r.o.o.k.
content: ^ <@!291925846556540928>  What are the IP addresses of the nodes in this network?

author: djrtwo
content:
This is the teku boonode ENR
`enr:-LK4QFqcQToZriXkTP-_oP1sVIXoynwTWG5yBrTUw2v04kDqcWEISm5pKrX7q2gVj3fetOENcJ-nFOIKxIKFYa78R2kQh2F0dG5ldHOIerk4dAIt-SeEZXRoMpAVfTA0AAAAAP__________gmlkgnY0gmlwhA1yJbCJc2VjcDI1NmsxoQOirrUOnSvlsumnw9K-ZZElP5fmBph8j2uA0HuqU9lHuIN0Y3CCIyiDdWRwgiMo`

If you open `rumor shell` and then run `enr view --kv enr:-LK4QFqcQToZriXkTP-_oP1sVIXoynwTWG5yBrTUw2v04kDqcWEISm5pKrX7q2gVj3fetOENcJ-nFOIKxIKFYa78R2kQh2F0dG5ldHOIerk4dAIt-SeEZXRoMpAVfTA0AAAAAP__________gmlkgnY0gmlwhA1yJbCJc2VjcDI1NmsxoQOirrUOnSvlsumnw9K-ZZElP5fmBph8j2uA0HuqU9lHuIN0Y3CCIyiDdWRwgiMo`

You get

author: djrtwo
content: so looks like the IP of the bootnode is `13.114.37.176`

author: r.o.o.k.

author: r.o.o.k.
content: ^ <@!291925846556540928> I have confirmed that you have not answered the question.  Do i need to write custom code to do this?

author: protolambda
content: There are specs for everything, to help you understand the protocol

author: protolambda
content: https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/phase0/p2p-interface.md

author: r.o.o.k.
content: Cool, so what are the 6 ip addresses?

author: r.o.o.k.

author: protolambda
content: "discovery" is the section you would want to look at. It's a UDP based protocol to find other nodes in a DHT

author: r.o.o.k.
content: Ok, so if the four prysm machines cannot communicate over TCP -- then that would effectively bring down the network?  Or do you expect some other mechanism to fill this gap?

author: jonny.derp
content:
> Ok, so if the four prysm machines cannot communicate over TCP -- then that would effectively bring down the network?  Or do you expect some other mechanism to fill this gap?
<@!488906727329366016> 

Even keeping 2/4 from communicating over tcp would be enough to stop finality

content: Oh wow, because they cannot form consensus at that point?

author: r.o.o.k.
content: geth has some great DoS mitigation built in, it was well made, and battle hardened by the looks of it.

author: r.o.o.k.
content: Strong timeouts, and strict buffer controls.  The last DoS condition with discover sessions was neat

author: djrtwo
content:
Heads up!
Jonny achieved the goal on `teku-attack-0`
At least for the time being, `teku-attack-0` is out of the running for a bounty

We'll circle back after the weekend, relaunch a teku net, and likely disqualify jonny's attack vector for that net
